successes.title: ORION4Sight: Sunglasses On Steroids
successes.description: ORION4Sight sunglasses on steroids are powered by revolutionary patented technology worn by Navy Seals.

Pledges.description: Our undying thanks for helping us bring our sunglasses to the consumer market.
A handwritten “Thank You” Note from Orion creator and patent-holder, Kirk Kreutzig.
The “Early Bird Special” of one pair of Orion4Sight sunglasses. This is the lowest price we'll ever offer. (Introductory retail price: $190)
If you missed out on the "Early Bird Special", here's your chance to get one pair of Orion4Sight sunglasses at a rock-bottom price, a savings of nearly $100 from the introductory retail price.
Got a special someone who could also benefit from our technology? Get 2 pairs of Orion4Sight sunglasses.
NEW: We've added the option for international shipping to the $170 perk. If you want 2 pairs and live abroad, this is the one you want.
Our glasses work better in a crowd, so you can get 3 pairs at this incredibly low price.
NEW: 3 pairs of our "Sunglasses on Steroids", but with the option for international shipping!
Four pairs of Orion4Sight sunglasses! Perfect for your golf foursome or your tennis doubles match.
NEW: 4 pairs of sunglasses, but with an option for international shipping!
Five pairs of our sunglasses! Did we mention our patented technology? At this level, you could outfit an entire basketball team.
